name: Night Shift (itch) (TomekS)
description:
NightShift is a simple logic game, you drive a forklift and have to deliver cargo to the destination in which you compete against time, but mostly yourself. That's right, with every new delivery you have to avoid a ghost of yourself who delivers previous package. While the number of deliveries grows, the game becomes difficult. Night Shift has a very simple controller (only left and right direction) but packs lots of fun with 5 amazing levels. And since our Leader sees everything, your story will end in the newspaper, so better make sure its a happy one. And there is also fun with ragdolls.

Made for Ludum Dare 42 Compo.
